Hello All,

We  are trying to use the times reported by JUnit as a benchmar=
k value.

Is that reasonable?

We understand that the setUp() Time is inclu=
ded and have taken 
some measures to eliminate that time element but we do =
not know if
the tearDown() time is also included in the reported time.

If =
the tearDown time cannot be eliminated or if our use of the Time 
values is=
 completely off-base, then I would ask if going to JUnit4 
would be better =
insofar as we could make use of the 
@Before/@BeforeClass/@After/AfterClass=
 constructs, hoping that they 
would eliminate the set up and tear down tim=
es?

We are on Eclipe 3.1 with Java 1.5 under MS.

Thank You
